title: Harris Vows To Fix US Immigration System, Trump Says "This Is Bad Timing"
content: Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris has vowed to impose tougher security measures at the border and fix America's broken immigration system
summary: Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris has vowed to impose tougher security measures at the border and fix America's broken immigration system

title: Earth's 'Mini Moon' To Be Visible On September 29. Here's How To Watch It
content: Mini-moons have been spotted before, and many more are likely to have gone unnoticed.
summary: Mini-moons have been spotted before, and many more are likely to have gone unnoticed.

title: 173 Hongkongers Say They Were Attacked With Bodily Fluids Over 8 Months
content: A court fined 26-year-old PhD student Lai Changwei HK$5,000 for squirting a liquid containing his semen onto a woman.
summary: A court fined 26-year-old PhD student Lai Changwei HK$5,000 for squirting a liquid containing his semen onto a woman.

title: At UN, Netanyahu Shows 2 Maps. Palestine Doesn't Exist In Either Of Them
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu stood at the podium of the United Nations General Assembly in New York on Friday, holding two maps.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu stood at the podium of the United Nations General Assembly in New York on Friday, holding two maps.

title: Israel Pounds Beirut But No Sign Of Hezbollah Chief Hassan Nasrallah
content: Israel continued ferocious rounds of airstrikes on Hezbollah's key strongholds in southern Beirut in Lebanon today. These strikes, which began last night in the heart of the capital city, sent plumes of thick smoke billowing into the sky.
summary: Israel continued ferocious rounds of airstrikes on Hezbollah's key strongholds in southern Beirut in Lebanon today. These strikes, which began last night in the heart of the capital city, sent plumes of thick smoke billowing into the sky.

title: Gisele Pelicot: The New French Feminist Icon In Landmark Rape Trial
content: Chants of several women hailing Gisele Pelicot as the emerging feminist icon filled the air as the 72-year-old walked into a courtroom for her mass rape trial in Avignon, France.
summary: Chants of several women hailing Gisele Pelicot as the emerging feminist icon filled the air as the 72-year-old walked into a courtroom for her mass rape trial in Avignon, France.

title: Iran Denounces Israel Attack On Lebanon As "Flagrant War Crime"
content: Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian condemned Israel's air strikes on the Lebanese capital's densely populated southern suburbs Friday as a "flagrant war crime."
summary: Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian condemned Israel's air strikes on the Lebanese capital's densely populated southern suburbs Friday as a "flagrant war crime."

title: Communication Lost With Hezbollah Head After Israel's Airstrike: Report
content: Hezbollah's head Hassan Nasrallah was unreachable following Israel's strikes on Beirut's southern suburbs on Friday evening, a source close to the Lebanese armed group told Reuters.
summary: Hezbollah's head Hassan Nasrallah was unreachable following Israel's strikes on Beirut's southern suburbs on Friday evening, a source close to the Lebanese armed group told Reuters.

title: Trump Vows To Prosecute Google For Showing "Bad Stories" On Him
content: Donald Trump on Friday accused Google of showing only "bad stories" about him and vowed to have the tech giant prosecuted if he gets back in the White House.
summary: Donald Trump on Friday accused Google of showing only "bad stories" about him and vowed to have the tech giant prosecuted if he gets back in the White House.

title: Several Hezbollah Commanders Killed In Southern Lebanon, Claims Israel
content: The Israeli army said Saturday it killed the commander of Hezbollah's missile unit in southern Lebanon in an air strike, along with his deputy and several other leaders of the Iran-backed movement.
summary: The Israeli army said Saturday it killed the commander of Hezbollah's missile unit in southern Lebanon in an air strike, along with his deputy and several other leaders of the Iran-backed movement.

title: Binance Founder Changpeng Zhao Released From US Custody: Report
content: Binance founder Changpeng Zhao was released from a correctional facility in California on Friday, Bloomberg News reported, citing a spokesperson for the Bureau of Prisons.
summary: Binance founder Changpeng Zhao was released from a correctional facility in California on Friday, Bloomberg News reported, citing a spokesperson for the Bureau of Prisons.

title: Brazil's Top Court Rules X Must Pay Pending Fines To Resume Service
content: Brazilian Supreme Court said on Friday that social platform X needs to pay some pending fines in order to resume its service in the country, according to a court document.
summary: Brazilian Supreme Court said on Friday that social platform X needs to pay some pending fines in order to resume its service in the country, according to a court document.

title: Trump Campaign Hacked: How Iran, China, Russia Are Targeting US Elections
content: Federal prosecutors in the United States have today filed criminal charges in the case. The hackers had allegedly targeted members of former president Donald Trump's campaign.
summary: Federal prosecutors in the United States have today filed criminal charges in the case. The hackers had allegedly targeted members of former president Donald Trump's campaign.

title: 33 Dead In US From Hurricane Helene: Officials
content: At least 33 people are dead, US officials said Friday, after Hurricane Helene hit Florida and several other southeastern  states, leaving a trail of destruction with several areas still under flood alerts.
summary: At least 33 people are dead, US officials said Friday, after Hurricane Helene hit Florida and several other southeastern  states, leaving a trail of destruction with several areas still under flood alerts.

title: Israeli House Damaged in 'Direct Hit' by Lebanon's Hezbollah Rocket
content: The Israeli military reported a "direct hit" by a Hezbollah rocket on a house and a car in the northern Israeli town of Safed on Friday evening, as cross-border strikes continued.
summary: The Israeli military reported a "direct hit" by a Hezbollah rocket on a house and a car in the northern Israeli town of Safed on Friday evening, as cross-border strikes continued.

title: Iran Embassy In Lebanon Warns Israel Strikes "Change Rules Of The Game"
content: The Iranian embassy in Lebanon condemned a series of intense Israeli strikes on the densely-packed Hezbollah stronghold of Beirut's southern suburbs Friday, warning of a "dangerous escalation" in the Middle East.
summary: The Iranian embassy in Lebanon condemned a series of intense Israeli strikes on the densely-packed Hezbollah stronghold of Beirut's southern suburbs Friday, warning of a "dangerous escalation" in the Middle East.

title: Why Hassan Nasrallah, Hezbollah Chief With Cult Status, Lives In Hiding
content: Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah is the only man in Lebanon with the power to wage war or make peace, but he leads a life in hiding to avoid assassination by his movement's arch-enemy, Israel.
summary: Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah is the only man in Lebanon with the power to wage war or make peace, but he leads a life in hiding to avoid assassination by his movement's arch-enemy, Israel.

title: Trump Says He Will Seek Google's Prosecution If He Wins Presidential Polls
content: Former U.S. President Donald Trump, who is the Republican presidential candidate, said on Friday he will seek the prosecution of Google if he wins the Nov. 5 election, claiming that the company only displays "bad stories" about him.
summary: Former U.S. President Donald Trump, who is the Republican presidential candidate, said on Friday he will seek the prosecution of Google if he wins the Nov. 5 election, claiming that the company only displays "bad stories" about him.

title: US Did Not Have Advanced Warning Of Israeli Strike In Beirut: Pentagon
content: The United States had no advance warning of an Israeli strike in Beirut and U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin spoke with his Israeli counterpart as it was ongoing, a Pentagon spokesperson said on Friday.
summary: The United States had no advance warning of an Israeli strike in Beirut and U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin spoke with his Israeli counterpart as it was ongoing, a Pentagon spokesperson said on Friday.

title: Never Followed "India Out" Agenda, Says Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu
content: Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu has denied having an "India Out" agenda, asserting that the island nation had a "serious problem" with the presence of foreign military on its soil.
summary: Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu has denied having an "India Out" agenda, asserting that the island nation had a "serious problem" with the presence of foreign military on its soil.
